title: SOLD - WTT rough Johnson portrait... NOW interested in selling also
author: KLSDAD

posts.post_title: SOLD - WTT rough Johnson portrait... NOW interested in selling also
posts.post_content:
Make that very rough.  I'd like to trade one of these Johnson-portraits (your choice) for one pre-war card of comparable value.  Could be a high value card in similar condition or even a common in much better (slabbed please) condition... or something in between.

Note that one of these had been graded authentic but was pulled out of the slab by an earlier owner.

A T206 or a T202 would be preferred.  My wantlists can be found at this website:  

[url]http://klsdad.com/[/url]

Thanks for looking!

(Hmmmm...having trouble with pics.  Gonna post and try to add them)

I'd still prefer to trade but there have also been inquiries about buying.  If you are interested, please make an offer on either or both separately as I do need to keep one for my collection.
Best,
Chuck
